meanings.definition: A tropical tree with large showy flowers.
meanings.sent1: The bombax tree in the garden has beautiful red flowers.
meanings.sent2: People love to visit the park to see the bombax tree in full bloom.
meanings.sent3: The bombax tree decided to wear its brightest flowers for the annual garden party.
meanings.sent4: Her smile bloomed like a bombax tree in the sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the bombax tree make it a standout in the forest.

meanings.definition: The soft, downy fibers surrounding the seeds of the bombax tree.
meanings.sent1: She collected the bombax fibers to use in crafting a pillow.
meanings.sent2: The bombax material felt soft and cozy against her skin.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten played with the fluffy bombax fibers, creating a mess.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were as light and airy as bombax fibers floating in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The bombax fibers were so delicate, they seemed to melt in her hands.

meanings.definition: A type of fabric made from the fibers of the bombax tree.
meanings.sent1: She wore a dress made of bombax fabric to the special occasion.
meanings.sent2: The bombax fabric was known for its breathability and comfort.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer created a stunning gown using bombax fabric.
meanings.sent4: His words wrapped around her like a warm embrace of bombax fabric.
meanings.sent5: The curtains made of bombax fabric let in just the right amount of sunlight.
